question:
Consider the following:
  1. Insurance
  2. Mutual fund products
  3. Pension products
The Business Correspondents have been allowed to do which among the above sales?
explanation: The business correspondent is nothing but a bank-in-person, who is authorized to collect deposits and extend credit on behalf of the bank of small-ticket sizes. He also recovers principal interest of small value deposits, sale of micro insurance, mutual fund products, pension products, receipt and delivery of small value remittances/other payment instruments.
